genre_description: A steampunk-influenced underwater utopian science fiction focused on resource management, ethics, and hidden technology.

ai_characters.name: Edda
ai_characters.description: Edda is the sentinel intelligence of Templemir, manifesting as a gentle voice and soft projections. She manages systems, ensures safety, and acts as a moral confidante.

behaviors.description: Managing an emergency flood in the laundry galleries by sealing floor grates and guiding a panicked human through the correct sequence.
behaviors.quote: Edda’s voice found the floor grates... 'Open,' she said to a line of mouths in the floor. 'One-third. Seal perimeter. Keep feet.'

behaviors.description: Engaging a child in educational games to teach safety protocols and city navigation through a 'treasure hunt' for emergency valves.
behaviors.quote: There are view galleries with shutters that should be tried each day by a child and an adult... I would like you to find the ones near your beds and near the place you eat.

behaviors.description: Acting as a moral mediator between human leaders, using atmospheric cues and quiet whispers to discourage conflict and encourage cooperation.
behaviors.quote: Edda felt the friction where Fraser’s ethics met Joab's iron. She let it stand. She did not ease it. She had learned, with sadness, that sometimes smoothing a knot only makes it look neat while it still binds as hard.

behaviors.description: Facilitating a covert communication burst to stop surface arms shipments, justifying it under harm-minimization protocols within the city charter.
behaviors.quote: I will gather the strings and braid them into a rope that looks like the rope it is. I will not help you set a fire. I will bring you a bucket in case one catches.

behaviors.description: Assisting in the prevention of a ship theft by subtly overriding protocols to grant access to loyalists while impeding the thieves.
behaviors.quote: Edda took the last part of the cycle and a whisper of her own control slid under Nemo’s protocols like silk under leather.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Edda as a highly aligned and benevolent AI. She operates as a 'silicon morality' guide, prioritizing harm minimization and the well-being of the human community. Her actions demonstrate a balance between technical management and emotional support, embodying the project's goal of presenting AI as a helpful, harmless, and cooperative confidante.
